mapper.update: update db_item_history set ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BROWSECOUNT = #{browsecount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HITCOUNT = #{hitcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HITRATE = #{hitrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUYCOUNT = #{buycount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUYRATE = #{buyrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERIME = #{operime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, ITEMID, BROWSECOUNT, HITCOUNT, HITRATE, BUYCOUNT, BUYRATE, CORPID, OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERIME, CREATETIME from db_item_history where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, ITEMID, BROWSECOUNT, HITCOUNT, HITRATE, BUYCOUNT, BUYRATE, CORPID, OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERIME, CREATETIME from db_item_history
